summary: Completed testing of Practice Better booking calendar integration. All backend APIs working correctly (17/17 tests passed). Frontend OnboardingBooking component displays calendar with available dates, time slot selection, and booking form correctly.

issues: HLS video codec error in headless browser - 'no level with compatible codecs found in manifest'. This is a browser compatibility issue with Bunny.net video player, not a code issue. Works fine in regular browsers.

critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper separation of concerns
Practice Better API integration uses proper OAuth2 token management with automatic refresh
Availability caching (60s TTL) helps reduce API calls
Frontend uses React Query for data fetching with smart polling
CSS uses design tokens for consistent styling
context_for_next_testing_agent: Practice Better booking integration is fully functional. Backend APIs return 370+ slots from Practice Better. Frontend calendar displays dates in January/February 2026. User flow: select date -> view time slots -> fill booking form -> confirm booking. All features tested and working.

features_tested.GET /api/booking/health: PASS - Returns healthy status with 6 active consultants
features_tested.GET /api/booking/availability: PASS - Returns 370+ slots with dates_with_availability array
features_tested.GET /api/booking/availability/{date}: PASS - Returns slots for specific date
features_tested.Frontend calendar display: PASS - Shows January/February 2026 dates with availability
features_tested.Date selection: PASS - Clicking date shows time slots (e.g., 5 available for Jan 15)
features_tested.Time slot display: PASS - Shows time slots like 7:00 pm, 7:30 pm, 10:00 pm, 10:30 pm
features_tested.Booking form: PASS - Shows form with pre-populated user data (First Name, Last Name, Email)
features_tested.Form fields: PASS - First Name, Last Name, Email, Phone (optional), Notes (optional)
